DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare two types of botulinum toxin type A to treat the involuntary muscle contractions in the neck
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Efficacy and Safety of Two Different Types of Botulinum Toxin Type A in Moderate to Severe Cervical Dystonia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with cervical dystonia/spasmodic torticollis for at least 18 months Successfully treated previously with botulinum toxin type A Breast feeding, pregnant or could become pregnant Surgery or spinal cord stimulation for cervical dystonia Previous injections of phenol, alcohol for cervical dystonia
